attributes.action: reverse the threat of cuts to Resident Wardens in Sheltered Housing Schemes in the Wycombe District Council area, where frail, elderly and vunerable citizens would be denied the security, familarity and community spirit they need and enjoy with residential wardens, Say no to mobile wardens!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wycombe District Council is planning a review of the services it provides to residents in its sheltered housing schemes.  It is looking at cutting resident wardens and replacing this service with mobile wardens who would visit on a daily basis.  This is unacceptable,accidents will happen,the community spirit will be lost and the residents will not have the security of some one on site, just a quick "hello" from a visiting warden and a emergency pull cord. This cannot be allowed to happen.
